# Pope Julius

**Type:** Person
**Confidence:** 85%

## Summary

A historical figure mentioned in the context of military conflicts involving the Duke of Ferrara. A Pope who significantly increased the power of the Church and successfully expanded its territories during his papacy.

| context | Involved in military actions against the Duke of Ferrara. |
| notable_actions | Gained Bologna, drove the French from Italy |
| role | Pope |
| successor | Pope Leo X |

> the assaults of the Venetians in 1484 and of Pope Julius in 1510
> Then came Pope Julius, who found the Church powerful...
> He also found the way open for accumulating wealth in ways never used before the time of Alexander.
